attributes.action: Close down radical Mosques as soon as possible!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the article on the front in The Times on September 7th 2007 confirming that 50% of Mosques in the UK are run by radical Muslim Clerics, preaching hatred and contempt for western values i suggest it is now time that that the PM put in place the necessary steps to close them down as soon as possible. If you agree please add your name to the petition, Thank you.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
